entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 18. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Becoming partly cloudy this evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 15 this evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 2 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Mainly sunny. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Clearing in the morning. Wind becoming east 20 km/h in the afternoon. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 22 in the morning and minus 7 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 2 April 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Increasing cloudiness. Low minus 15.
